There were no other sightings in New York on or around August 31st 2004
Summary: Can any one confirm a comet
divs: Sighting DetailsCan anyone confirm a comet in the SW sky relative to NY State around 9 PM ESTNebulous object with very faint tail observed from 9PM to around 930PM in SW skystarting at about 45deg moving very slowly to about my zenith 90 deg. Seemed todissipate as the sighting went on. Moved very slowly in relation to the stars.Tried unsuccessfully to observe through Telescope, but was able to observe using10X50 binoculars.1. Me and my wife were out for a walk.2. We were looking up at the stairs and noticed it at the same time.3. Had no idea.4. See description.5. See description.6. Slowly dissipated.Would very much appreciate it if any one can confirm a comet. The object seemedto me to be extremely high in the atmospherenot a comet or not very farin thesolar system, maybe a cometout in space. Thanks
